name: 3rd World - A CyberPunk Tale
blurb: Cyberpunk MMO Tactical Game- Build Team, Complete Missions, Challenge Power vs Others, Sec-Net and the Corporate Overlords!

rewards.reward: (FRAG BAIT) CIVIL ACCESS- FREE Download of the Game, Old School Role-Playing Game Version of 3rd World in PDF format. Your name listed in our "Special Thanks" section in-game, facebook and on www.3rdworld.co

(FODDER) RED CARD ACCESS- FREE Download of the Game, Your name in our Special Thanks section as well as a 3rd World Video Game T-Shirt, "I was Fragged in 3rd World and all I got was this lousy T-Shirt" with Red Access Card and your Name on the left chest!
(FODDER) Level  *ADD-ON* NOOB PACKAGE!\r\nOriginal Fodder reward plus, 1 Additional Gang Unit Slot, +1000 Game Credits, 1 Additional Weapon!

(DENIZEN) ORANGE CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (Orange Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus, 3rd World iPhone 4 or Android Cell Phone Case cover! PLUS Choose a Name, Race and Profession for a Mercenary for other players to choose from in the rogue's gallery of Sec-Net!

(DENIZEN) LEVEL *ADD-ON*  STARTER PACKAGE!- Original Denizen Reward plus +2500 game credits,  3 Gang Unit Slots rather than single, 1 additional Weapon, 1 Additional Armor, 1 Additional Item. 1 Implant.

(PLAYER) GOLD CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (Gold Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus, 3rd World Splash Screen Poster, Your Merc Named after you and a mug that says "Sec-Net's Most Wanted", Copy of the 3rd World: A Cyberpunk Tale Digital Soundtrack featuring the hardcore songs from the video and the game!
(PLAYER)  level *ADD-ON* - DIGITAL PACKAGE!- Original Player Reward plus +4000 game Credits, 3 Gang Unit Slots, 1 Ferox Marauder Body Guard Unit with Alien Weapon!  1 Motion Detection Device.

(CITIZEN) GREEN CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (Green Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus, +10000 Game Credits, 3rd World Poster with choice of Dendrite, Ferox, Greks, Human Male, Human Female or Wardroid, Your Choice of Name for a Mega-Corporation in the Game, i.e "Maxwell" Firearms, or "Frost" Cryolabs Ltd. for use in Mission Briefing and Plot!

(EXCLUSIVE) BLUE CARD ACCESS-  Previous Reward (Blue Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus +20000 Game Credits,  Control of 1 Operation in the Sprawl and 6 Gang Unit Slots to protect your interest, Access to EXCLUSIVE Gang Units to choose from including more exotic races like Greks and Dendrite that use spell casting.  1 Body Performance Enhancement Implant (Move Faster, Tough Skin), Choice of EXCLUSIVE level Weapon or Item, Your Mega-Corporation Name displayed on a billboard in the background environment within a Mission, and a FREE Special Weapon Upgrade! 16" x 20" 3rd World Splash Page Plaque Signed By All Members of the team, In game Credits for helping out!

(ROYAL) PURPLE CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (Purple Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus, RETRO PACKAGE!- Old School Role-Playing Game Version of 3rd World: A Cyberpunk Tale Printed Rule book that uses d10 to play, 3rd World: Head Hunter Comic Book teaser!,Autographed Scrapbook copy of all sketches, design doodles and concept art from 1997-99 and the present signed by 3rd World Team!

(ANGEL) WHITE CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (White Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus +50000 Game Credits, Control of 1 Block House in the Sprawl with housing for 9 Gang Units Slots (game starts with 1 Gang Unit slot).  1 Neural Performance Implant (Infra-Red Vision, Sonar, etc.) ANGEL Level Weapon or Item, a Sec-Net Scrambler to cloak against detection, Access to ELITE Gang Units including Wardroids. BETA TESTER!- QA with the 3rd World Team and help make a better game, Design a Weapon of choice for other players to buy in the 3rd World Game! In game Credits for helping out!

(ELITE) BLACK CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (Black Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) plus,  +75,000 Game Credits, Control of 1 Block Tower in the Sprawl with housing for up to 15 Gang Units!  Personal Wardroid Gang Unit (Off the grid and unregistered by Sec-Net!), 1 Alien Tech Weapon of choice, Picture of You customized "Cyberpunk" style like the 3rd World development team by Mr. Frost himself and used as a special NPC character in the game! Your Image on your item of choice; Apparel in Women's and Men's, Smartphone Case, Mouse Pad, Drinkware! In game Credits for helping out!

(VIP) CORPORATE CARD ACCESS- Previous Reward (Clear Access Card on left chest of T-shirt) 100,000 Game Credits, Control of 1 Corporation in the Sprawl using your corporate name and 21 Gang Unit Slots to employ your "Staff", 1 Advanced Alien Tech Weapon of Choice, 2 additional neural and Physical Implants plus Design a Level with the 3rd World development team featuring your custom "Cyberpunk" likeness as the story plot NPC and Mega-Corporation of the Mission. In game Credits for helping out!
